text: Practical Advice To be a useful part of system definition, rich pictures should: e contain a lot of information and be open to interpretation; e present processes and structures in a coherent, well-balanced way; e show at least one problematic area; e point at several relevant computerized systems; e be rich, but not chaotic; + illuminate key aspects of a situation in a way that promotes under- standing at many levels; and " avoid representing data and data processing.
